title: Development of High-Quality Online Language Courses Through Collaborative Mentoring (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online education development and basic knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course using non-real-time LMS in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, where current practitioners learn to establish mentoring relationships with instructional designers for language education content development

learning_goals: The collaborative mentoring framework achieves over 80% alignment between learning objectives, resources, and strategies.
Applying time management strategies during collaboration with instructional designers reduces the development period by 20%.
Applying skills acquired through the mentoring process achieves a score of 3 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
